definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°
Kikkoman, Japanese brand of soy sauce, food seasonings etc

sentences.chinese: 我超愛龜甲色的眼鏡框。

sentences.english: The characteristic is the yellowish dome shaped shelter.
sentences.chinese: 日本石龜的特點是稍黃色的和圓頂形狀的龜甲。

sentences.english: Down in the street a tortoiseshell cat was chasing a dead leaf, " etc."
sentences.chinese: 街道上一隻龜甲色的貓正在追逐一片枯葉。

sentences.english: The liquor contains six traditional Chinese remedies, including deer antler and tortoise shell.
sentences.chinese: 黃金酒加入了包括鹿茸和龜甲在內的六味中藥。

sentences.english: The inscriptions on animal bones and tortoise shells.
sentences.chinese: 就是那種刻在龜甲和獸骨上的文字。

sentences.english: XuanZu ordered a ban tortoiseshell ship water-forces, encountered opposition from adm. yi sun-sin.
sentences.chinese: 宣祖下令水軍禁止建造龜甲船，遭到了李舜臣的反對。

sentences.english: Kikkoman is now the world's largest maker of naturally brewed soy sauce.
sentences.chinese: 龜甲萬公司目前是世界最大的釀造天然醬油的公司。

sentences.english: Down in the street a tortoiseshell cat was chasing a dead leaf, " etc."
sentences.chinese: 街心處一隻龜甲貓正在追逐着一片敗葉。

sentences.english: Is to use that word Daoke animal bones in the shells.
sentences.chinese: 就是把字用刀刻在龜甲獸骨上。

definition: item made from woven silk or rayon
to polish a text/rhetoric/ornate language/to use florid language to conceal errors/to gloss over
phonetic component of a Chinese character
ribbon (as a decoration)/cordon (diagonal belt worn as a sign of office or honor)
lit. the cicada sheds its carapace (idiom); fig. to vanish leaving an empty shell/a crafty escape plan
